Articles.Content:
I'm in orbit, with 2700 m/s orbital speed and 2503 surface horizontal speed but the 2500 m/s contract will not complete. What am I missing?

[Screenshot](http://i.imgur.com/JnGb6Ov.jpg)
I'm guessing you have to be in the atmosphere. I bet you will achieve it when you re-enter.
or check surface speed - maybe it's less than 2500
I made a new mission and the contract was gone, and it isn't in my contract archives as completed, and it isn't an available contract either. A bug, I guess?
